text: Narbonne () is a French commune, a subprefecture in the Aude department. It is in the Occitanie region. It is also the capital of the arrondissement of Narbonne. It was a wealthy port and major city in Roman times but now is at about from the shores of the Mediterranean Sea. ==Geography== The commune of Narbonne has an area of . The lowest point in the commune is 0 m along the Mediterranean coast and the highest point is ; its average altitude is and the city hall is an altitude of . Narbonne and its neighboring communes The commune of Narbonne is surrounded by the communes: ===Climate=== The climate of Narbonne, in the Köppen climate classification, is Csa - Mediterranean climate with hot summers. ==Population== The inhabitants of this city are known, in French, as Narbonnais (women: Narbonnaises). With a population of 52,855, Narbonne has a population density of inhabitants/km2. This urban area is the centre of the metropolitan area of Narbonne, formed by 24 communes with a population of 91,825 inhabitants (2013) and an area of . == Administration == Narbonne is a subprefecture of the Aude department, the capital of the arrondissement of Narbonne and the administrative centre () of three cantons * Narbonne-1, with 24,958 inhabitants (2014). * Narbonne-2, with 19,785 inhabitants (2014). * Narbonne-3, with 18,637 inhabitants (2014). It is part of the intercommunality Le Grand Narbonne (). === Twinned and partner towns === Narbonne is twinned with: * Weilheim, Germany * Aosta, Italy * Salford, England ==Gallery== File:Narbonne (march 2008).jpg|View of the city. File:Basilique Saint-Paul de Narbonne001.JPG|Saint-Paul de Narbonne Basilica. Palais des Archevêques de Narbonne.jpg|Palais des Archevêques. File:Façade de la gare de Narbonne.jpg|Narbonne train station. ==Related pages== * Arrondissement of Narbonne * Communes of the Aude department ==References== ==Other websites== * Mairie de Narbonne website * Narbonne official tourism website * Le Petit narbonnais (Wiki Narbona) Category:Communes in Aude Category:Subprefectures in France
